Primarily walking, standing, and bending for extended periods with some sitting.Ability to communicate effectively with verbal, written, visual and listening skills.Dexterity of hands and fingers to operate any required equipment as well as to operate a computer keyboard, mouse, and other technical instruments.Able to lift and carry heavy equipment, up to 50 pounds.Ability to pull cables.Ability to climb ladders and work on raised platforms.
